programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Throughout human history, there have been sudden and dramatic leaps in our evolution that simply cannot be explained by Darwinian theory. Ancient Astronaut theorists propose that the “missing link” is extraterrestrial intervention.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers Little Field Mouse has a wonderful collection of interesting Autumn leaves and Little Grey Squirrel has a collection of acorns of all varieties, he decides to start a collection of his own. But Little Nutbrown Hare cant decide what to collect, until his father encourages him to realise that he has a wonderful collection of memories.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare And Little Field Mouse are surprised to find an egg lying on the ground. Blue Bird agrees to look after it and when a rather odd and demanding bird hatches, she loves it like her own. When Little White Owl hears it calling one night, she tells them all that the ‘lucky chick’ is a baby owl and she will teach her all an owl needs to know.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Apricot doesn’t like loud noises and gets really scared during a thunderstorm. Which objects make a loud noise and which objects are quiet?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and his pals all receive party invitations, but the partys location is a mystery. Small circular marks left behind by whoever delivered the invitations are an important clue. It leads Huckle and pals to Miss Honey whos been walking with a crutch. Grateful for the help she got raking up all her leaves, Miss Honey decided to throw a party for all the volunteers./Huckle and his pals discover a mysterious gigantic spoon.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is drinking water in his kitchen, and wonders why he has to drink it? What if there wasn’t any? He springs over to Okido to look for answers. In Okido Zoe and Felix are in their garden getting ready for a surprise day trip that Zim, Zam and Zoom are taking them on! They are packing Felix’s backpack to be prepared for anything – Messy helpfully contributes a bath plug and a sock, before they whizz off to the Cloudship to find out where they’re going.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: Messy is dancing to the music from the radio in his kitchen when he hears some noise outside, and wonders what the difference is and how you make music. So he goes to Okido to find out with his friends. In Okido, Zoe is playing a ukulele and Felix is playing a recorder and they are trying to make music, but they’re not very good yet, and neither is Messy when he tries! They see the Cloudship arrive and go in to see Zim, Zam and Zoom. “The Musicbots have a bad case of rhythm-rust!” declares Zam.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some “groove booties” programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the towns Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Sam uses Harrys bucket to collect drips from a leak in the house Harry rushes to Dino-World to save the dinos from drowning.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: At his schools Show and Tell, Harrys dinosaurs are branded as old-fashioned in comparison to one of the other kids hi-tech Dino-Robot.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the deserts of Africa, Jane and Zumi take a break from patrolling. While Jane dozes off, Zumi detects a disturbance - a baby hyena in distress. Despite trying to wake Jane, Zumi decides to investigate alone, following the baby hyena as it walks aimlessly, further away. In the garden, Leo, Katie, and Hero are trying to make each other laugh and whoever laughs first, will have to mow the lawn. Katie ends up losing for laughing at her own joke but is saved from mowing with a call from Jane. Alarmed by Zumi missing, they travel to Africa to help Jane. Zumis disappearance prompts a search using a sound detector and Katie’s tablet to pick up sounds from far away and after hearing from different animals, they finally capture the laugh of the baby hyena! They head towards the sound and stumble upon Ranger Rocky who startled them with a lion’s roar. After learning about hyenas from Ranger Joey, Ranger Joey mentions a lion finishing its meal and Katie suggests that the hyenas might show up for its leftovers. Hence, the rangers head towards the leftovers and as predicted, a clan of hyenas show up and the baby hyena immediately runs towards them, ending in a loving embrace with its mother. Back at the treehouse, Leo calls it mission accomplished and teases Katie who is disgruntled, mowing the lawn.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas befriends a stray dog who is wandering around the railway and tries to find him a home. In the process, Thomas derails and the fuzzy little dog raises the alarm.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: A little railway show comes to Sodor and a misunderstanding leads to all the small engines on railway turning up at Ulfstead Castle to participate.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Doctor Natureza needs help to clean up the ocean. Indeed, a large sheet of plastic floats on the water and endangers the flora and fauna. Grisu, accompanied by Stella, boards the « laboratory boat » to help Doctor Natureza vacuum up the waste with the machine she has developed. But throughout the process, Grisu burns the pumping engine. They cant vacuum the ocean anymore. Fortunately, Grisu has the idea of using all the waste that lies around them and Naturezas bicycle to design a new – and ecological- device that finally allows them to achieve the mission. Because, as firefighter, Grisu never gives up!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Mr. Cornuzzo, a journalist, comes to Dragontown to check whether Stella’s school blog articles about Grisu are true. He quickly comes to the conclusion that what Stella invented everything, and she is actually a liar. To his eyes, Grisù is nothing more than a tiny lizard!Driven by his friendship for Stella, Grisu tries to do his best to prove Cornuzzo that there are dragons in Dragontown. However, acting like a dragon is none of Grisù’s best skills.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is fascinated that his friend Little Grey Squirrel is going to stay in his dray all Winter long. He and Little Field Mouse decide to hibernate in the hollow log until Spring, but soon become bored and fidgety. Little Field Mouse gives up and plays in the snow. Will Little Nutbrown Hare manage to stay inside, or will he be tempted out as well?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After a long quiet winter in the meadow Little Nutbrown hare announces that he can’t wait for winter to be over so he can enjoy the other seasons with their special treats to see, hear and taste. Will the sound of icicles tinkling in the wind, the taste of a frozen Winter berry and some very unusual tracks in the snow convince the little hare that Winter is just as special as the other seasons?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their Snow Rescue badges, Koko and Wilson have to rescue Zephie, who is pretending to be stranded. They start to bicker about the best way to do it, causing Zephie to tip over. Now they have to do a real rescue! They realise they will need to work as a team and, using Calley’s rescue wagon, they get Zephie back on her wheels and earn their badges.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Scoutbadger goes for a walk with Rosie and her father, Basil. During the walk, Scoutbadger discovers that the flamboyant Basil, who tells him stories that fire his imagination, is more at ease with the tales he tells than with reality.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are building a new aquarium at the sea life center for a baby tiger shark. Scoop is excited, imagining the shark will be like a pet puppy. Leo is less than enthused, barely concealing his fear of sharks. When the shark is collected at the docks and placed in a holding tank inside Muck’s tray, Scoop convinces Muck they should take “Stripy” the shark “for a walk” around the neighbourhood. After introducing her to Pilchard, and pointing out the mayor’s office (startling Mr Bentley!), they see JJ and Saffi on the playing field, teaching Cooper some pet tricks. Determined to teach Stripy some tricks too, Scoop and Muck begin a game of fetch... which ends up with Muck getting his front bucket stuck between two trees. Back at the sea life centre, Bob is concerned. If the shark doesn’t arrive soon, she will miss her feeding time.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building an Automatic Car Wash for Curtis’s Garage, but Roley is being as obsessive as ever, checking and re-checking that the newly laid tarmac is absolutely, completely flat. Just as Roley gives Bob the all clear to start building, Mayor Madison and Mr. Bentley arrive in Phillip expecting to use the car wash! Wendy explains they’ve been held up – but to come back later. Once the car wash is ready, Wendy explains how the control console works and does a ‘test run’. It works perfectly and at last Curtis can re-open his garage. Roley, however, is still not convinced the tarmac is flat. To re-assure him Bob tells Leo to do one more test run. As the run starts, Roley thinks he sees some un-flattened tarmac and rushes into the car wash to flatten it!

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Mr. Rabbit makes up coupons for free cookies to celebrate the grand opening of his cookie shop and gives them to his young son to drop in the mailbox outside. But the coupons never arrive. After chasing down the clues from the mail carrier to the post office and back again, Huckle determines that Jr Rabbit mistakenly dropped the coupons into the trash container beside the mail box. /A model boat is mysteriously broken and Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to discover how it happened.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo catches a raccoon digging around in his trash. The Junior Rangers take the raccoon back to the forest where it can find its own food. However, some unfriendly raccoons make things difficult for Leo and company...

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A yellow-eyed penguin wanders into Hero’s kennel. The Junior Rangers head to New Zealand to find the penguin’s home, but can they prevent tourists from disturbing yellow-eyed penguins on the beach?

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon is both excited and nervous about the super-duper big slide at the pool. He uses Gaspard as an excuse not to go on, saying that he has to join him on the little slide! Will Simon be courageous?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Stanley and Balthazar ruin Flutters playing cards, but seeing the butterfly girls sadness, they ask Dollys help to make a brand new card deck.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Leapy the grasshopper makes fun of Katie the yellow ladybird, because she blows bigger bubbles than her. Later, regretting her actions, Leapy has to find a way to apologize to Katie.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Dolly accidentally knocks over a glass of water on Berrys painting. The colors on Berrys painting get faint and watery. Berry gets mad at Dolly for ruining his painting. Later Berrys friends admire the little snails unique style of painting, so he insists that it was his idea to make the painting like this. But then Dolly arrives and sheds light to Berrys lies.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Dolly leaves for and adventure with Harry Hedgehog, so she asks Bubbles to take care of her flowers while shes gone. Bubble forgets to water them, so they quickly wither. Now Bubble has to find a way to make the flowers bloom again.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The residents of the forest decide to celebrate the last day of the year with music. The ants form a choir, Dr Owl becomes the conductor, and all the little bugs create instruments for themselves. But Iris, the icebeetle loses her bells, so everyone starts to help her find them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The boys resent the girls for not telling them what Christmas surprise they have in mind for the night. But all things go well, when the surprise is revealed and their old friend, the Stargirl takes them on a magical ride on her starship in the clear night sky.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The forest friends go for a walk in the forest, but Bubbles cant stop hiccupping. His friends try to help him by giving all sorts of advice. To eat, drink, hold his breath... But none of them seem to help. Finally, Stanley scares Bubbles from behind the tree. The hiccup stops, but now Bubbles is offended by Stanley. They all make amends later, after Stanley saves Bubbles from slipping into the creek.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando are both tired but insist on one last game of Hide and Seek before bed. Pando finds a great hiding place under the covers of Bing’s bed but by the time Bing finds him he’s fast asleep. Bing is tired too and gets upset when he thinks there’s nowhere left for him to sleep, but Flop and Padget find a way.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Amma to get lunch ready. Bing watches yummy peas and delicious carrots go into the pot, but when lunch is served theyre all mixed up together and Bing doesnt like it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing falls in love with a lost dog he and Flop find in the park and decides he wants to keep her. When the owner turns up Bing is very upset when it comes to saying goodbye to his new friend.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: It’s time for spring-cleaning and Tilda decides to give her friends all the things that she doesn’t need any more and brings them in her garden. But her friends now think she’s moving out.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Molly’s wool that she just bought disappeared! She’s sure that it must have been stolen, so Tilda and Rupert found the Appleseed Detective Agency. Are the friends going to catch the burglar?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert finds out that Molly has a beautiful singing voice and asks her if she can sing a song for Tildas birthday. Molly absolutely wants to do this but can she overcome her stage fright?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Summer’s day Little Field Mouse is very excited to show Little Nutbrown Hare her new favourite thing, a very pretty flower… the prettiest ever! She lets Little Nutbrown Hare borrow it to show Big Nutbrown Hare, but when it blows away during the night Little Nutbrown Hare worries how his friend will react. Will he be able to work up the courage to tell her what happened?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Trying to keep cool on a sticky Summer’s day by the stream, Little Nutbrown Hare and Big Nutbrown Hare have lots of fun skipping stones and throwing sticks. When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that sticks float, the two follow the sticks down the river to see where they go. It’s not an easy chase, and there is a surprise around every corner. Where will the sticks end up?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Summer is at its hottest and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse want to run and play but the sun is just too hot and strong. That’s until Little Grey Squirrel gives them both a wonderful present, big leafy parasols. When he later changes his mind and takes Little Nutbrown Hare’s parasol back, the little hare is naturally disappointed. Can the friends find a way for all of them to be happy?

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon, Gaspard and Maelle are building a sandcastle at the beach when they spot a weird-looking creature, but can they convince anyone else that it actually exists?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers have a brush with a poacher as they try to return an Indian Star Tortoise to its home in the scrub forest.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn his badge, Wilson must show that he knows how to recognise destination icons. He gets distracted by following a butterfly and totally forgets where he is supposed to be going. After running around to some wrong locations, he finally concentrates really hard, and remembers he was supposed to be going to the foundry.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Brewster and Wilson compete to earn their ‘Helping Wheels’ badge. However they get so caught up trying to outdo each other, that they don’t help anyone. Koko beats them to it, winning her badge by helping a little girl rescue her kite. In the end, Wilson and Brewster help each other out and decide to work together as a team to earn their badge.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are super excited about going running in the woods! But they must wait for Fanni to wake up from her nap before heading out… When the nap drags on, the parents suggest they take Fanni to the forest in her stroller so that she can continue to sleep. However, this means everyone must remain silent during the excursion so as not to wake the baby: Shhhhhh!... Luckily, it ends up being a great opportunity to discover all the amazing sounds the forest has to offer!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Nina is sure that her dog Loupiote is the fastest animal around! But T’choupi believes Brocoli the goat can move even faster! Nina rises to the challenge, and before you know it, Loupiote and Brocoli are unknowingly competing with each other in a race! But the dog and goat do whatever they please. And when Ciboulette the cat gets involved, it’s all downhill from there!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi loves eating Fred’s goat’s cheese… but thinks again after getting a whiff of the goats’ pen: Ew!... So he’s very happy when Nina suggests they clean it out! Once they’re done with the cleaning, the two friends decide they could also make it more cozy. But shhh, not a word to anyone: it’s a surprise! However, after making the pen all spic and span and super comfortable, they’re shocked to find that the smell is still there!?! Thinking he’s found the perfect solution, Tchoupi sprays Mom’s perfume inside the pen… But what do the goats’ think of this new scent inside their house…?

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Mehdi takes the children to the sports course where Charleys mum is supposed to bring a delicious snack. But heres the catch: Mummy arrives with a surprise guest... Fanny! The children are delighted... except for Charley who would like to play with his friends! His little sisters presence never ceases to annoy him, and its not going to get any easier on the sports course...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia unintentionally damaged Ellas favorite doll. How can they repair it and put it back at her place without Ella realizing? It seems they have to develop a lot of skills to do so.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam has a toothache. His daddy goes to get Dr. Bobola, but Dan, his older brother, thinks the doctor is going to pull his tooth! To avoid this, Julia tries to takes care of Sam instead of the doctor.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam has never left his residence and dreams of traveling the world. On the other hand, the world Julia knows the least is the Mouse Mansion. What if they played at traveling together staying there?

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: It is Christmas Eve and a lot of passengers are coming home to Sodor for the holidays. Connor cannot carry all the passengers so he promises to come back and collect them the ones who cannot get on board.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: The whole island is celebrating Christmas and there are decorations everywhere, but it doesnt look very Christmassy at the scrap yard. Percy worries that Reg is missing out and he tries to find something to take to Reg to cheer him up.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Its Caillous turn to take Gerald the class pet home, but when Caillou isnt careful, Gerald disappears!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou takes a trip around the world and visits the plains of Africa, the Arctic, ancient Egypt, and Paris.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and the gang race all over Busytown trying to find the lock that fits and old key they found. They search everywhere from the Busytown Museum to Mr Gronkle’s antiques. They come up empty until they remember that an old roll top desk was being delivered to the antique store near where they found the key and had a lock on it. They try the key and it fits. / Chocolate sauce on Lowlys car leaves Huckle and the gang puzzled.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Would you believe that water is falling from the sky in the hot savanna…well it can happen if you have an elephant friend next to you…and when Monkey sees a friend he always invites him to play his favorite game Monkey See Monkey Do.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey tries to keep his balance and walk slowly on the edge of a stack of hay, but things are not going as planned. Thinking it is impossible Monkey cautiously watches as cat gracefully walks along the fence. When cat succeeds Monkey is so impressed that he offers cat to join him in his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: As Norman leaves the house, the giant hat he made for the Pontypandy Hat Parade gets stuck in the door, just as the sitting room goes up in flames!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Norman, James, Sarah and Mandy go to play Castles and Kings at the ruins, Gareth builds them a dragon to use in their game.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: A heat-wave hits Woodland! Franklin, being cold-blooded, takes a while to understand that his friends are all too hot (except Snail) to play the big game of tag they’d previously planned. But once he does, he’s determined to find a fun way to help all his pals cool off and have fun. Luckily, a big shady breezy willow tree and a new game, “slow-motion freeze tag”, proves just the thing! / Franklin invites Rabbit for a sleep over to play rocket ship in the tent, but Harriet always seems to be grabbing his friend’s attention. When Franklin realizes that Rabbit misses his own siblings, the three combine to make a great Rocket Team.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie, Woodsy and Scoutbadger have decided to play a big game of hide-and-seek, but their plan falls through when their parents announce that, in the afternoon, they have to babysit their kid sister Berry. Despite her brothers doubts, Rosie suggests that Berry take part in the game. It quickly becomes obvious that Berry is too little for a real hide-and-seek.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What can help Sketchy to become a sledding champion? Doodleboo explains how to draw a penguin.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What does a king love to do on the beach? Doodleboo explains how to draw a Castle.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who loves to learn new tricks ? Doodleboo explains how to draw a Dolphin.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty’s hat gives Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave a magic Hatty-hat each to wear and then runs off to have fun in Hat Land with all the Hatty-hats from their previous adventures. For the first time ever, Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave take turns in asking questions and a hat-less Hatty takes their place in the Game Time line-up! Each question takes them closer to reuniting Hatty with his favourite hat - and Hatty discovers it’s much harder answering questions than asking them!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty helps Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave pack up their Rollypods for a vacation at the seaside. There are so many things they want to take, but which items do they need for the perfect beach holiday and which items can be left behind? The sing a song to help them remember everything they’ve packed and check it all back on board for the journey home, so that nothing is left behind!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The friends are all playing together in the Autumn meadow. Little Redwood Fox inadvertently spoils all the games of the day, but the others put their heads together and come up with a game that suits her perfectly.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: It’s a fine Autumn day and it seems that all of the meadow creatures are out enjoying the sun. Little Nutbrown Hare is surprised that Big Nutbrown Hare knows every single creature in the meadow. He sets out to trick him into believing there is a brand new animal… called a ‘Grrr-umph’, which he cleverly creates out of shadows! Will Big Nutbrown Hare be tricked?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare discovers that everyone else can whistle but him… the birds, Little Grey Squirrel, Otter and even the wind in the river reeds. Inspired by the wind, he practices really hard and eventually learns to blow through a reed himself to make it whistle. He and his friends make a beautiful and eerie whistling symphony amongst the reeds.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando discover a new climbing frame at the playground. It’s got climbing bits, tippy bits and even a wobbly bridge. But when Bing gets to the top of the slide it’s too scary for him to go down. Bing watches Pando to see how he does it, then he helps Hoppity Voosh to go down. When Hoppity likes it Bing has a go too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Coco and Charlie come to play at Bings house they measure how tall he is, but when they get the measuring ritual wrong, Bing is scared hes growing down!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is disappointed he cant go play because hes all sneezy but Sula and Amma bring him a nice carroty bagel to help him get better.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing Hide And Seek at the crèche with Sula, Pando and Coco. Bing doesn’t go to the toilet with all the others before the game starts and when he needs to go before he is found he has to decide whether to give up his hiding place or try and hold on.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are making ginger bunny biscuits for Charlie and Coco.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends are picking apples when an old steam locomotive appears on the hill. At the request of the scarlet beetle train engineer, the little friends help repair the locomotive and paint the wagons in bright colors. The cinnabar beetle thanks them by taking them on a special train trip to the great waterfall. The friends enjoy the journey and have a fun day together. At the end of the trip, they happily return home with the colorful train.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Dolly goes for a walk, and finally she is enriched with a beautiful cherry and a good friend.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Noddy And The Magical Moon Dust Mepe
programme.desc: The Toy Town Fair is in town and everyone is excited except Big Ears. Hes concerned because moondust has suddenly stopped falling from the sky. Can Noddy and Marlo bring the magical moondust back to Toy Town, or will the mischievous Goblins spoil the fun?

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey decides to go and learn collecting and storing skills from the chipmunk...When meet Chipmunk in the forest, Monkey the secret to a a good storage place, and Chipmunks learns what it means to have a friend. When they return Monkey stores his leafs up on a tree, but once he touches the tree the entire collection drops from the canopy and covers monkey and parrot….

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Pontypandy Pioneers bake up a storm to earn their baking badge, but when a greasy oven bursts into flames, its time to call the rescue team!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy tries to earn her ‘Pioneers Yoga Teaching Badge’ by teaching the rest of the Pioneers the Upward Octopus sequence. But constant interruptions test her patience and she ends up stuck on a cliff ledge!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: A bird has flown into Kate’s house, and Kate has an idea to get it out—but her parents can’t hear her over the commotion. In Mimiloo, a group of lemmings are in trouble and decide that Mim-Mim is their leader. They ask him to find them a new home—but a soft-spoken little lemming has a great idea herself!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Dad gives Kate a puzzle that seems too hard to solve. In Mimiloo, Mim-Mim finds an enchanted ring that leads everyone on a quest to find the hidden treasure of King Tut-n-Bunny. It leads them to a sphinx which is full of obstacles and challenges that test the gang’s abilities and Mim-Mim’s courage.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out on a picnic with T’choupi and his family, plus Nina, Dad chances upon a four-leaf clover! He gifts it to Fanni as a lucky charm. As a result, convinced that he’s having a bad day, T’choupi is now determined to find a four-leaf clover of his own, to turn the tide and enjoy nothing but good fortune for the rest of the day!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: The parents are hoping Fanni will take her afternoon nap, but she’s still wide awake, playing with her animal sounds toy… Until it stops working… Oh dear! T’choupi quickly steps in and improvises animal sounds. But when he quickly loses interest, Mom comes up with an idea: they should go and find the nearby animals and listen to their cries, straight from the horse’s mouth! With a bit of luck, this pleasant expedition will tire Fanni out enough to send her to sleep…

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia want to play as if they own a restaurant. But its not so easy to decide on the menu, the name of the place, and to manage their first difficult customers, Ella and Tonio.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: When Tilda breaks a teacup right after getting up, for Molly theres only one explanation: its Friday the 13th. At first, Tilda dismisses this as pure superstition. After several further mishaps, however, she begins to worry that maybe there is something to it. Her friends are absolutely convinced.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: Mommy must go shopping but when she’s back, she wants the Triplets to play for her and her friend the new piece they learn The Flower’s Dance. Unfortunately, the day before, when Eliott was supposed to make them repeat, the Triplets preferred to play with their mini-cars. Which is way more fun! How will they manage to learn a piece in less than three hours? Hopefully, their imagination is always there to help.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplet’s armchair is quite damaged, Mommy decided to recover it with a new fabric and it will be to the siblings to choose the color! Poet wants blue, the color of the sky, Turbulent wants green, the country’s color, and Girl wants yellow, the color of the sun! Not easy to agree on a same color but careful! If they don’t decide quickly, Mommy will, and she has some strange color ideas like grey, the color of the rain!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Margaret is teaching orienteering to the children. And to put into practice what they have just learned, she has organized an orienteering course, to be played in teams. Scoutbadger, Rosie and Pico are in the same team, the red one. The badger isn’t happy about being with Pico, whom he believes to be too slow and a little wimpy. Scoutbadger is in it to win it! In his eyes, anorienteering course is a race.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou takes part in the egg race and learns to keep trying and never give up!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Captain Caillou goes on an underwater adventure to help a mermaid find treasure!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Daisy the railcar can carry passengers without having to pull any coaches. So, when Thomas is sent to work in the quarry for a spell and Daisy takes on his usual responsibilities, Annie and Clarabel are left behind. Daisy takes every opportunity to remind Annie and Clarabel that, as long as she is working Thomas’s branch line, they are not needed. But, when Daisy becomes popular with her passengers, she has to pull some passenger coaches after all! Annie and Clarabel get their own back by tricking Daisy into thinking she is need of repair. But two wrongs don’t make a right and Annie and Clarabel only end up being left behind in a siding… and then pulled along by dirty old Diesel! *Cough! Cough!*

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Zephie starts a club and is selective about who can join, causing division amongst the friends.

programme.title: Chuggington 04
programme.desc: Action Chugger goes undercover as an ordinary chugger and learns that it’s hard work without his super powers.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Mehdi takes the children to the sports course where Charleys mum is supposed to bring a delicious snack. But heres the catch: Mummy arrives with a surprise guest... Fanny! The children are delighted... except for Charley who would like to play with his friends! His little sisters presence never ceases to annoy him, and its not going to get any easier on the sports course...

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave help Hatty deliver pumpkins to all their friends at Halloween. Their friends have all requested different numbers of pumpkins, as well as different sizes and colours, so they have to remember which pumpkin is for which friend and make sure they deliver them correctly. Dave wants to know who the giant pumpkin is for; but that’s just one of Hatty’s Halloween surprises - there will be costumes, pumpkin lanterns, pumpkin pie and even a party!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who would be a great companion to have on an adventure? Doodleboo explains how to draw a dog.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Hero comes across an egg in the garden. To Leo’s surprise, a baby Komodo dragon hatches from the egg instead of a baby bird. The Junior Rangers decide to bring the Komodo dragon back to the island it comes from.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Stanley, the stag beetle, and his friends excitedly try out the new traffic park, practicing the rules of the road with roller skates, scooters, bicycles, and small motorcycles. However, Balthazar, the bee, ignores the signs and causes a minor accident by driving recklessly. With the help of the Queen Ant, the little friends learn traffic rules and signs so they can play safely and happily together.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: In the fall, the chimney sweep smoke beetle visits the forest friends to clean their chimneys. In Patricks chimney, he finds a shiny hair clip that turns out to be a gift Dolly sent to Katie via Pigeon Post. The friends solve the mystery together, and Katie finally receives the shiny hair clip.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, and their friends are picking apples when an old steam locomotive appears on the hill. At the request of the scarlet beetle train engineer, the little friends help repair the locomotive and paint the wagons in bright colors. The cinnabar beetle thanks them by taking them on a special train trip to the great waterfall. The friends enjoy the journey and have a fun day together. At the end of the trip, they happily return home with the colorful train.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Dolly goes for a walk, and finally she is enriched with a beautiful cherry and a good friend.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Bing finally blows a big bubble but gets upset when Pando pops it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing inadvertently pees on his blankie. Fortunately, his toy has a cape just as soft.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma’s crèche, a talking ride on car. It seems like fun until Talkie Taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced Bing and Sula use their imagination to play a game they really want to play without being dictated to by the noisy taxi.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song shes suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Sitting at the table with her family, Rosie is talking about how she is looking forward to her wonderful holidays with her father. But the little vixen is surprised by the lack of attention of her two brothers, too busy talking about their own holidays. Soon, Rosie feels left out and is worried that the twins might forget her. To prevent this from happening, she becomes very clingy. Singing, making fishing rods, drawing… Rosie is alwaysaround. So much so that it starts to annoy her brothers.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends go on a hunt for treasure in the meadow and collect all kinds of unique gems like flowers, feathers, apples and egg-shells. But there’s a hole in Little Nutbrown Hare’s leaf-bag and he loses the precious collection along the way. Luckily, Big Nutbrown Hare is not far behind to collect the lost treasure as well as follow its trail to find his son.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse innocently pick lots of Spring flowers from a field and deliver bunches to their friends. When they realise that they are being followed everywhere by a cloud of yellow butterflies, they realise that the butterflies need the flowers, to feed from their nectar. How will they lead the little butterflies to more flowers and sweet nectar?

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: The owl chicks dont understand why the mirror copies them. Mama Owl brings them a new mirror but accidentally places it opposite the old one, so the little owls marvel as they multiply in it. Doctor Owl securely attaches the new mirror in the nursery, where the chicks can play and have fun.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam, Julia, and the other kids in the Mouse Mansion read the adventures of Magic Mouse, a magazine hero. But one day, some of them are helped by Magic Mouse who seems to really exist...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia always play together. Tonio and Ella challenge them to spend an afternoon without each other. But will they be able to do it, and even try to see each other without being seen?

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets have a new idea on their mind, they want to be exactly the same and in that purpose, they wear masks at breakfast to trick Mommy. Their attempt is completely useless because, as Mommy says, theyre a lot different from each other. The Triplets dont agree and they want her to start dressing them identically. Mommy refuses, she doesnt want robots as children. But when they meet other Triplets in the park that day, they finally realize its not so bad to be different.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: At the end of a day without arguing, the Triplets dont want to go to bed because they want to stay together, even at night ! Poet has an idea, they should meet in dreamland and then share the same dream together. Turbulent and Girl think its a wonderful idea and follow Poet in his game. But the problem is, when they arrive at Dreamland, none of them wish to do the same dream. Poet wants a dream with polar bears and lots of hugs, Turbulent wants to live on a deserted island and Girl wishes to take care of little babies...

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: Action Chugger has a hard time relaxing.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Pontypandy Pioneers bake up a storm to earn their baking badge, but when a greasy oven bursts into flames, its time to call the rescue team!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy tries to earn her ‘Pioneers Yoga Teaching Badge’ by teaching the rest of the Pioneers the Upward Octopus sequence. But constant interruptions test her patience and she ends up stuck on a cliff ledge!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: When Dad catches a cold, Kate wants to help him feel better. In Mimiloo, Gobble and Tack have caught a bug too…the giggle bugs! Kate and Mim-Mim must find the cure: merry berry bush berries. The bush will only release berries if they make it laugh, but Mim-Mim’s jokes aren’t funny. He’ll have to tickle its funny bone another way!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: A family camp-out in the backyard has Kate both excited and nervous—she’s never slept outside before. In Mimiloo, she and Mim-Mim find Boomer with a case of the hiccups! The only cure is to scare the hiccups away with a journey to Happy Hollow—a place that’s supposed to be full of spooky creatures! Will it work?

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou’s balloon fun at the harvest fair is cut short when his excitement causes him to accidentally lose his balloon. A make-believe hot air balloon race teaches him a lesson in mindfulness, which he puts to use to win a new red balloon!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is disappointed that he has to stop flying paper airplanes for bath time, so Daddy suggests an underwater adventure where Caillou realizes that when one adventure doesn’t work out, it’s okay to let it go because there are other ways to have fun.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: The three miniature engines are the smallest on the Island of Sodor. People love to come to see them, but sometimes they don’t seem to take them seriously, making comments about them being cute, or like toys, but not really seeing them as being useful. When it is time for the sheep’s wool to be delivered to market, the Small Controller says it is the miniature engines’ chance to prove how useful they really are. Rex takes on the job and it is all going well, until an overturned cart spills bales of wool onto the line and poor Rex ends up being derailed.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers invent a new mechanical leg for a Japanese Spider Crab.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle claims to have discovered a brand new animal species - it has the fur and body of an otter, webbed feet and bill of a duck, and a tail like a beaver. Kylasaurus needs help!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pats delivering a bucking bronco. But hell need Dr Gilbertsons lassoing skills first!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has an extra special delivery today - an actual pop star!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The playful rabbit wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to create a stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur on the pavement

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a potato in Amma’s vegetable patch with a comical ‘face’, so they take it under their wing, naming it “Nosey”. The two children look after Nosey and show him around the crèche but unfortunately Nosey goes down the slide too quickly and his ‘nose’ falls off. Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: On a snowy day in Big City, Oswald is babysitting Catrina. Oswald takes her to get an ice-cream cone at Johnnys Shop. As they take a shortcut through the park, they come across the Egg Twins building a fort, Daisy skating, and Henry making a snow angel. Every time Oswald stops to join in, Catrina cries until she can participate, too. By the time they get to the ice-cream shop, Catrina is so tired from her adventures that she falls fast asleep.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald decides to clean out his flat and throw away his unwanted rubbish. But as he makes his way to the dump, he encounters his friends - Henry, Daisy, Madame Butterfly, and the Egg Twins - who all find uses for his things. By the time he gets to the dump, the wagon is empty. So now he can start loading it up with other peoples rubbish!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Film director, Carl Parker, has commissioned Bob and his team to build the set and rocket for a movie – Space Robots 3. The clock is ticking, as they need to release it before Christmas. Leo reveals to Scoop he has aspirations to act, whilst Carl seems to have little control over his remote controlled robot D11D that keeps spooking Muck and running over Wendy’s toe. Saffi, who is hanging around the studio gates, is a big fan of D11D which leads an eager-to-impress Leo to claim he will be acting in the film, not just building sets. Leo with Scoop’s help then tries to get the director’s attention in various scenes whilst Bob’s team and the director are trying to get the set and rocket ready for filming. Leo decides to give up but then has an idea. The next morning, the first day’s filming is due to start but Leo is nowhere to be seen. Carl calls action on the first scene (between D11D and a much larger robot.)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and the team are asked to build a set for movie-star Dash Lightning’s new film, Muck thinks that his dreams have come true. Dash Lightning is Mucks’ hero, so he decides that he wants to meet him whilst working at Spring City Studios. But when Muck gets distracted with trying to find his hero, he doesn’t pay attention to any of the jobs he is doing. On racing to meet his hero, Muck clips the set’s backdrop and he doesn’t wait to check the pyrotechnic lights, causing them to fall towards the studio-lighting crane. Just as the director calls action, the set falls apart and the pyrotechnics explode towards the lights, risking a fire.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare And Little Field Mouse go on an adventurous journey through the woods in search of a special Autumn leaf. They leave a trail of acorns to find their way home, but Little Grey Squirrel unwittingly collects the acorns and leaves them all lost in the woods. Luckily he is able to help when he climbs to the treetops and spies the meadow in the distance.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Spring is coming and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse are very brave and go on a journey through the meadow to discover the source of a mysterious – and slightly spooky - creaking sound. They follow the clues to discover… it’s the frozen lake melting, and singing as it does!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse pick lots of delicious strawberries. Little Nutbrown Hare eats all his and runs out so Little Field Mouse shares hers with him. When he goes to collect some more for his friend he eats them all too. Little Field Mouse shows him how to eat them really slowly to make them last longer.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and Finlay can hear some scary noises in the Nursery. Who is making the scary sounds?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Something knocks Sgt. Murphy’s hat off his head, chops the tops of Baker Humperdink’s baguettes, and sheers a path through a flower bed. Although no one saw anything, they all heard it make the same whoop whoop whoop sound. Putting the clues together, Huckle, Sally and Lowly figure out that it was Vanderbuilt’s new, out of control, boomerang./The mysterious disappearance of Mayor Fox leaves Huckle and the gang on an important search.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy discovers his socks are in the washing machine! This makes him wonder how a washing machine knows what to do so he goes to Okido to find out… Messy is just about to land in Okido as usual when he is caught mid-air by Zam’s new camping invention: Camperbot! “Are we going camping?” asks Messy, still held upside down. Zoe and Felix excitedly tell Messy that they are going to test out Camperbot up on Giant Mountain. Felix and Zoe show Messy what Camperbot can do, but when Messy asks it for a sock sandwich it replies that it is “not programmed” to do that… “Not programmed?!” mimics Messy, questioningly.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy has just woken up and is looking for his sock breakfast, but it is under his toy box and he can’t reach, or move it… He needs to know how to move heavy things, and the best place to find out the answer is Okido! When he arrives Zoe and Felix are also trying to move a heavy box! They need to go to the recycling centre today. So they all go to Zam and Zim to find out the best way to do it. Zim, Zam and Zoom are sunbathing and enjoying Zam’s latest invention when the three arrive.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apples groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pups obvious dislike of performing in public. Its up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesnt want to do.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry cant find one of his red cowboy socks - the ones with a white fringe.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Charlie lends Harry her Sergeant Shout toy for the weekend, Harry promises not to let it leave in his bedroom.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: At the base of the Andes Mountain, Peyo concocts a berry dip while Pico brings berries to him. Hearing a distressed animal, he finds an animal trapped inside a cave with its entrance blocked by a fallen tree. In the Garden, a duckling follows Hero around which Hero reacts by hiding behind Leo. They receive a call from Peyo and identify the animal as a Guanaco through the computer. With PlatypusOne, they reach the mountain, use a winch to free the Guanaco, discovering its a chulengo - a young guanaco. The chulengo follows Peyo closely, much to Peyo’s confusion. They decide that the chulengo should be with its family but they’re unsure how to transport it as it is afraid of PlatypusOne. Dumbfounded, they stumble upon Ranger Rocky who seeks Ranger Joeys advice. Ranger Joey explains Guanaco social structures and adaptations. The chulengo nudges Peyo which causes him to trip over a stone and a few herbs fall off from his satchel - which the chulengo eats up. This triggers an idea from Katie and the team uses Peyo’s herb to get it to follow PlatypusOne up the mountain to find its family. On the mountains peak, they find other Guanacos grazing and they reunite the chulengo with its group. Back at the Treehouse, a picture of the guanaco herd is hung, marking another successful mission. In the garden, Hero befriends the duckling, but it rejoins its mother.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: In Brazil, Thomas meets two wood-burning engines whove never travelled beyond their eucalyptus railway. Thomas agrees to swap jobs with them for the day, but this causes more trouble than he expects.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When a pretend emergency quickly becomes a real one, its up to Emily to think on her wheels and solve a big problem.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu has promised Mr. Toramento to help him clean up the beach. The problem is that he has more important things to do, like taking the fire truck ride that David promised him. Or even more urgently, helping his firefighting heroes find the fire truck keys that David lost. So, he messes up his work, until he realizes that its better to do things right. At the end he eventually finds the keys and gets his fire truck ride.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu wants to set up a special birthday party for Fume at the pizzeria, and to offer him his favorite pizza. Unfortunately, Mr. Guellec has hurt his arm and he cant harvest the tomatoes that the pizza sauce requires. With Stellas help, Grisu turns into a farmer but its not an easy task to harvest Guellecs high tomato plants for such a tiny dragon. Fortunately, Grisu has plenty of ideas: if you cant reach the tomatoes, try to make the tomatoes reaching you!And after having burnt the cart he needs to deliver the tomatoes in time, Grisu finds a way to achieve his mission by creating the first rolling catamaran!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The snow in the meadow is so deep that Little Nutbrown Hare has to stay under the Old Oak tree. Wondering what he is going to do all day in deep snow and with no one to play with, his imagination soon takes over as he creates new kinds of fun. By the time his friends reach him, Little Nutbrown Hare can’t believe how the time has flown!

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Koko and Wilson have to load their cars with special blocks and bring them back to Vee without dropping any or leaving any behind. They think this is the easiest badge ever – until they see that the blocks are oddly shaped and won’t all fit into the cars! Eventually they realise that if they slot the blocks together to make cubes, they fit into the cars perfectly. They deliver the load to Vee and earn their badges!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie talks too much. She has told the twins that her best friend, Biva, is going to meet Loudo. The two brothers are extremely excited at the news and decide to spy on the two children. This is a catastrophe for Rosie - unless…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: While working at Fixham Campsite, Dizzy wants to camp out with Leo and the Spring City Rockets till she’s put off by the creepy crawlies. She later regrets her decision and returns with Scoop and Muck but they are frightened by the spooky story Leo is telling and the Rockets think they are the creatures from his story. Everyone panics and the build is damaged as they flee. Dizzy gets her wheel stuck in a ditch and is left behind.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Sports guru Skye Sampson asks Bob to build a 100 metre zip-line for her new fitness program. Its a job that Leo should love to help with, but he seems very distracted. Leo is put in charge of finishing the launch platform and fixing the zip-line, but he keeps making mistakes and wonders if he is up to the job. Lofty tries to convince Leo of how well theyre doing, but when the zip-line comes loose its the last straw. Leo says he should give up being a builder. Scoop and Lofty panic that Leo is going to leave the team – they decide they must make things right! But in their attempts to fix the platform they end up demolishing it instead.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids search for the owner of a sketchbook that contains drawings done from a high point of view. After determining the artist wasnt drawing at the top of a ladder or up in a tree, they discover the sketchbook belongs to one of Busytowns tallest residents, Jeremy Giraffe. / Huckle and gang investigate a strange temperature drop which turns Busytowns summer to winter.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: When a Sunda slow loris lands in the garden, the Junior Rangers quickly learn that they have to return it to the wild. Will they manage to find the slow loris a home? Or will the slow loris end up as a snack for a hungry sun bear?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Join the Junior Rangers as they race across the tundra to reunite a lost reindeer calf with its herd. However, a river crossing might prove too tiring for the young reindeer.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon is very excited about the idea of seeing lots of animals when he goes on a school outing with his class, but all he finds on the trip at first is rain and a beetle!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The forest friends decide to help the Millerbug fix his broken windmill, but the wind doesnt seem to be blowing. Zephyr goes on to save the day, by asking the Wind to help the group restart the mill. Finally, the Millerbug can prepare his delicious bread.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Zephyr and Leapy decide to make a little surprise box for Dr Owls most beloved belongings. They want to decorate the box with shells, so the Robin flies them to the seashore to collect the most beautiful shells. They even get some help from the Crab, and get a ride back home on a back of a turtle.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Stanley gets a silver robot from Frank as a present. The robot can move, make sounds and also flash its lights. When Stanley wants to show it to Berry, the robot slips from his hands and breaks into pieces. While Stanley and Berry are out to get some help, Bubbles finds the robot and repairs it.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: During Christmas, Dr Owl gets sick, and Bubbles cant seem to wrap his head around the fact that doctors can also get sick. Flutter helps him understand that the car of a car mechanic can also break down, and the shoe of a cobbler can also get torn sometimes. So the friends make a beautiful surprise for the old doctor.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: There are two balls in the kindergarden. One, the big bugs play with, and one for the small bugs. One day one of the balls bursts and they all have to find a way to peacfully play with the one remaining ball. Soon they realize that they can also play together, so Stanley admits that the small bugs are not that clumsy after all.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Moonbug cant walk. The centipede always helps him to get him to where he wants to go. But one day the centipede has to go on a long journey, so the Moonbug is left to go alone to Alfonsos concert. But Eddy, the potatobeetle builds a special chair with wheels for Moonbug. The Moonbug can finally go alone to Alfonsos concert, and anywhere he wants to.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: A great storm tears down the fireflies house. The whole house breaks into peaces and all the lanterns with it. So the small firefiles go on a journey to find the wise old Shining Bug, and ask him to give them new lanterns. When the fireflies return home they are surprised by their new home, the forest friends have built them.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Nuair a tha Bing a’ cluich geama le fòn-làimhe Flop, chaneil rudan a’ dol mar bu chòir oir tha am fòn-làimhe a briseadh nuair a tha e dol na sgeing air an làr. An àite seo innse do Flop, tha Bing ga chuir dhan bhiona. Tha e faireachdainn cho dona mun seo ach tha e ag ionnsachadh gum feum e innse mar a thachair. When Bing is playing a game with Flop’s mobile phone, he accidentally drops the mobile and it breaks. Instead of telling Flop, he throws it in the bin. He feels upset about it all and learns that it’s best to tell the truth.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. After Coco’s dance, Pando’s song and Sula’s acrobatics display everyone is excited to see Bing’s finale. When he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright so his friends, and rainbow fairy mice, come to the rescue.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Sula and Amma watch the fireworks at Bings house. Sula doesnt like the loud bangs, so she wears ear mufflers. Bing, on the other hand, thinks he is brave enough to watch the fireworks from the garden. All of a sudden, a very loud bang sends Bing running into the house and hiding under the kitchen table. Flop makes special ear gloves for Bing to enjoy the fireworks show without having to hear the loud bangs.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda launches an herbal delivery service, and demand is huge. But Billy and Benny mix up orders: now Rupert cant sleep, and Robin sleeps through his morning song. Tilda must fix the chaos.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert builds soapbox cars, and Billy and Benny race them excitedly. Edna thinks its too dangerous and secures the track, while Karl and Molly struggle with near-sightedness and fear.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda and Rupert are on a boat trip when they suddenly find themselves stranded on dry land. Where has the water gone? They meet Berta, the beaver girl, and discover her dam is the cause.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: You Summer in the meadow is a great time to find tasty snacks to eat. Big Nutbrown Hare seems to know all the best tricks and hiding spots for the yummy treats and Little Nutbrown Hare can’t help but wish he was as big and smart as his father. However, he soon finds out that there are some things a little Nutbrown Hare can teach a Big Nutbrown Hare.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On Summer’s hottest night Little Nutbrown Hare finds it hard to sleep. When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is impressed by Blue Bird’s description of a flowery field that looks just like a sea of colour from her bird’s eye view. He visits the field with Big Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, and they discover that everyone has their own unique view of the field, and each one is special in its own way.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The whole family goes off on their bikes for a ride to the lake for a picnic. Simon is ecstatic, he pedals off super-fast. But then he reaches a hill, which is too hard to negotiate. He has to get off his bike and push it up the hill. Pfffff, bummer. Going down the other side only lifts his spirits for a short beat because now he has a flat tire. Simon is even more bummed now.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A swim in the garden brings Leo and Hero up close and personal with a Malayan water monitor. The Junior Rangers set out to search for the monitor’s home, but will their jeep survive a river crossing after a jeep float gets punctured?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, Koko and Brewster must keep to a schedule picking up passengers. Koko is too eager and gets ahead of schedule, while Brewster is too cautious and gets behind schedule – but in the end, they both learn to run on time!

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Brewster is assigned to look after Ebo the elephant while some work is done on his enclosure. He decides to show Ebo where he lives. Ebo likes it at the depot because there is a pond to play in and he loves the chug wash. When it’s time to go home, Ebo doesn’t want to go back to the Safari Park. With Koko’s help, Brewster tricks him into the car, and returns Ebo to the park. Ebo is unhappy – until he sees the new water feature, that’s been built for him to play in!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out walking in the forest, Benedicte sets a challenge for Tchoupi and Nina – to find their way back home all by themselves, using landmarks they come across along the way. But when they spot a squirrel, they momentarily forget to pay attention, and stray from the path back home...

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Loupiote the dog is feeling particularly playful this morning! She grabs T’choupi’s stuffed and runs off to bury it in a secret location! T’choupi manages to get his plush bear back… but its fur is covered in mud! Dad washes it… but now it’s all wet and will never be dry by tonight! Tchoupi feels down: how will he be able to sleep without his precious teddy bear?! He sets off on a quest to find a replacement… but comes back empty-handed. Nina thinks she just may have a solution: what if she were to teach him how to get to sleep… “Teddy-less?...!”

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Luce are awe - struck when they find out that Ciboulette the cat has just had kittens! Dad asks them to leave the babies alone as they need peace and quiet in order to grow. But the two friends go to see Ciboulette and her adorable kittens over and over, behind Dad’s back. Until… all the cats go missing!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: This morning, Charley is late for school: all the doors are locked! The Headmaster arrives and reminds him that his classmates have already left for the forest for a treasure hunt. And its the Headmaster himself who offers to take Charley with the rest of the class, but the little boy panics: hes going into the forest with the Headmaster! And what if they dont find their friends? .

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: The magic show that Dr. Spotty was about to perform tonight is cancelled. Julia is so disappointed that Sam decides to invent something instead. But how could he impress Julia as much as a magician?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Grandma offers Sam and Julia a curious calendar representing the Mouse Mansion, each numbered window revealing an apartment the way it was long ago when its inhabitant first arrived.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: One day while repairing an embankment, Marion strikes something hard and insists it must be the mast of a Viking Ship. It looks like a water pipe to Thomas but Marion is adamant that it isn’t. But the next day Thomas notices flooding near the bank and then there is a landslip and Marion has to admit her mistake and help prevent an accident.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Percy misses his friend Gator and keeps thinking back to the times they had together. It’s making him sad, so the other engines advise him to keep himself busy to take his mind off it. So Percy rushes about trying to keep busy, and ends up losing control of some trucks which roll into an old mine. Percy is frightened to go in after them, until he remembers Gator again and what Gator taught him about being brave!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Sheriff Caillou rides into action to stop an outlaw from robbing the bank!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and Clementine visit the arcade and play different games!

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Hilda arrives at Sallys dance party, shes suddenly struck with a severe case of the sneezes. Thinking shes come down with a cold, her friends take her to Doctor Lion who informs her she has an allergy to something. It turns out shes allergic to her best friend Sally - or rather, the new rose-scented perfume Sallys wearing./Huckle, Lowly and Sally find they have their mystery-solving hands full when things start disappearing, in the blink of an eye!

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is lying on the ground with orange floating devices. When Parrot asks what he is up to, Monkey explains that he is practicing for the world Floating championship but when he does it in the water he always sinks. Mole appears and tells them about Alligators impressing floating abilities and they decide to go to the lake and pay him a visit.eir natural habitats through engaging song and dance.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Its cold weather and Monkey has made a banana peel scarf for Parrot but that is not very warming or comfortable. Mole appears and tells them about sheep and her famously warm wool. Monkey feels that it would be the perfect textile to use and so they fly off to the farm. Watching her inspires monkey to invite Sheep to a fun game of Monkey See Monkey Do!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: James has discovered Bella Lasagne’s old pizza recipes and starts to bake pizzas in the Whole Fish Cafe. Everyone is really impressed the recipe is fantastic!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Charlie takes Sarah, Mandy and Norman out to sea. But the kids tussle over who should be captain until Charlie is knocked into the sea and Norman causes the engine to catch fire.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: Tensions arise when Franklin and Beaver play the super hero team of Dynaroo and Gadgetio Koala. When they learn to co-operate like their comic book heroes they finally manage to save the day. /Franklin is frustrated when Harriet can’t keep up with the game of Space Guys. After carefully explaining the rules to her, the game goes much better.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Margaret is teaching orienteering to the children. And to put into practice what they have just learned, she has organized an orienteering course, to be played in teams. Scoutbadger, Rosie and Pico are in the same team, the red one. The badger isn’t happy about being with Pico, whom he believes to be too slow and a little wimpy. Scoutbadger is in it to win it! In his eyes, anorienteering course is a race.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What do you need for a great birthday? Doodleboo explains how to draw a birthday cake.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What doesnt have feathers and can fly silently like a bird? Doodleboo explains how to draw a ladybug.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: How to travel all around the world ? Doodleboo explains how to draw a flying saucer.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave learn some dance moves for a hoe-down on the farm. Hatty calls out the moves to help them all remember the order of the steps and they practice dancing together in line, in time to the music. When Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave dance at the hoe-down dance party, it’s so good everyone wants to join in!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave compete as ‘Team Hilltop’ against ‘Team Jungle’ in some fun sporting challenges. Dave throws well in the Banana-boomerang, Ruff-Ruff jumps high in the bamboo high jump and Tweet performs some fancy moves in the jungle gymnastics. But have they won enough points to beat their jungle friends? Or will victory rest on success in the final running relay?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare tries to jump high enough to reach a last Autumn apple on a high branch. Unable to reach it, even with the help of Little Field Mouse, he gives up. But after watching some little salmon struggling to swim up a waterfall he decides to ‘think like a fish’ and try, try, try again until he reaches the tasty prize.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare falls into a muddy Autumn puddle and is delighted when he startles Little Grey Squirrel, who doesn’t recognize him at first. This starts a great new game of ‘Surprise!’ as they dress up in disguises to surprise the others. But they weren’t ready for Little Field Mouse, who works out a clever way of surprising her friends even more.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Autumn day Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse convince Little Grey Squirrel to leave his pile of spotted acorns unattended, so they can all play with the crunchy leaves. While they’re gone Little Redwood Fox discovers the yummy acorns and takes them home. Once she finds out they actually belong Little Grey Squirrel, she has to decide whether to give them back or keep them.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is Its a Bing thing! which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are having so much fun playing together, they dont want to say goodbye.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Bing accidentally leaves his Hoppity Voosh toy at the park, Amma helps Bing focus and retrace his steps to find it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are finally ready to leave for their picnic just as it starts to rain.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula invent a noisy game with a helium balloon they find stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.desc: The characters in the Berry and Dolly stories are a bunch of tiny bugs and beetles who live alongside one another in the forest. programme.title: Berry And Dolly

programme.title: Noddy Saves Christmas Pe
programme.desc: When Santa discovers his magic clock that helps him get to all the children in time is broken, Noddy steps in to make sure the presents get delivered and Christmas is saved!

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is trying to sculpt in the mud but he is not able to create mud that is not too soft or hard for sculpting. When they meet Pig he shows them how he creates mud for sculpting. Monkey invites Pig to play Monkey See Monkey Do!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: A Go-Kart Challenge goes topsy-turvy when Peters Go-Kart catches fire and sets ablaze everything in its path!
